titleStmt.title: Short and plain directions for the observation of the Lords day as they were delivered in a sermon in the church of Mallow, in the diocess of Cloyne : suited to the capacity of the common people / by John Bulkelly, M.A. and rector of Cloyne.
titleStmt.author: Bulkelly, John.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Lambeth Palace Library (London, England).
